column1: '''''Leaf by Niggle''''' is the first separate reprint of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s short story "[[Leaf by Niggle]]". The publication features a foreword by Alonzo L. McDonald and a four page discussion guide at rear.<ref>{{webcite
